messages.subject: Homeschoolers can participate in Campbell's Soups "Labels for Education" program
messages.msgSnippet: Many of you know about the Campbell s Soups Labels for Education program. We just discovered that individual homeschool families are eligible for the program
messages.messageBody:
Many of you know about the Campbell's Soups "Labels for Education"
program.
We just discovered that individual homeschool families are eligible
for the
program as well. The letter below was the response we got when asking what
to provide. Very easy! At the bottom of the letter is the contact
information from the coordinator, Anne Pizarro.

FYI - there is also a "Labels for America" program. With this, if your
child does any kind of volunteer work/project you can get up to 2,000
points
a year.

You can go to their website www.labelsforeducat ion.com then "Coordinators
and Schools" (on the left), then "Manage the Program", then "Advice from
Anne".

This is a great program where you can get all kinds of stuff from art
supplies to electronics.

Happy collecting!
Vallery LaBarre

PS: Box Tops for Education (from General Mills) also allows homeschool
groups to participate, but there has to be 15+ children. It's worth
getting
your homeschool group involved. www.boxtopsforeduca tion.com

-----Original Message-----
From: director@labelsfore ducation. com
[mailto:director@labelsfore ducation. com]
Sent: Monday, December 31, 2007 11:01 AM
To: Barry Johnson
Subject: RE: Message for Anne

Dear Barry,

I am writing regarding the Campbell's Labels for Education Program.
Accreditation from your state would be a certificate or a letter
recognizing
your home school as an educational institute. Some states do not require
accreditation. Please send a letter of request along an invoice
showing any
educational merchandise that you have ordered for your home school. Please
send your letter of request to:


Campbell's Labels for Education Program
Attn: Customer Service
P.O. Box 3130
Grand Rapids Minnesota 55745

Feel free to call 1-800-424-5331 if you have any questions on enrollment
into the program. Thank you for your inquiry. Have a great day!

Sincerely,
Anne Pizarro
Director of Labels for Education
1-800-424-5331
http://www.labelsfo reducation. com
AP/lh

To be added to our emailing list for upcoming Labels for Education
announcements click the following link:
https://apfco. com/labels/ optIn.cfm
